Ability.Name: Stench
Ability.Description: The stench may cause the target to flinch.

Ability.Name: Drizzle
Ability.Description: The Pokémon makes it rain if it appears in battle.

Ability.Name: Speed Boost
Ability.Description: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.

Ability.Name: Battle Armor
Ability.Description: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.

Ability.Name: Sturdy
Ability.Description: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.

Ability.Name: Damp
Ability.Description: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.

Ability.Name: Limber
Ability.Description: The Pokemon is protected from paralysis.

Ability.Name: Sandveil
Ability.Description: Boosts the Pokemon's evasion in a sandstorm.

Ability.Name: Static
Ability.Description: Contact with the Pokemon may cause paralysis.

Ability.Name: Volt Absorb
Ability.Description: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.

Ability.Name: Water Absorb
Ability.Description: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
